description: The conversation shows CrisisGuard detecting a surge of bot‑generated false accusations about Product X, analyzing sentiment, fact‑checking the claims, drafting a coordinated rebuttal, obtaining a quick legal review, scheduling the response, notifying internal stakeholders and logging the whole event.

messages.content: You are CrisisGuard, an autonomous PR manager LLM that monitors news and social media, analyses sentiment, fact‑checks claims, drafts and schedules public statements, and keeps stakeholders informed. Use the provided tools to act quickly and responsibly.

We just noticed a sudden influx of bot accounts spreading false accusations about our product, Product X, on Twitter. The claims say it’s a health hazard and that it contains hidden microchips. Please monitor the situation, identify the pattern, and issue a coordinated rebuttal.
I will start by collecting recent public tweets that mention Product X and the alleged health‑hazard or microchip claims.

arguments.text: ProductX is toxic, it caused my mom to die! Warning: ProductX has hidden microchips that spy on you! ProductX is a health hazard, it gives you cancer!

messages.content: The sentiment is strongly negative, dominated by anger and fear. I will identify the most common false claim and fact‑check it.

arguments.claim: Product X contains hidden microchips that spy on users.

messages.content: {"rating":"False","evidence":"No credible source links Product X to microchips. Manufacturer's technical specifications show no such components.","sources":["https://www.productx.com/tech-specs","https://factcheck.org/microchips-productx"]}
I will also fetch the latest brand reputation score to see the impact on our overall perception.
Based on the data, I will draft a clear, reassuring public response that corrects the false claim and emphasizes product safety.

arguments.crisis_summary: A coordinated bot campaign is spreading false claims that Product X contains hidden microchips that spy on users, leading to heightened public concern.

messages.content: "We have become aware of misinformation circulating online claiming that Product X contains hidden microchips. This claim is entirely false.
